reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in the Premier Inn for just one night recently - visiting friends. (This is the second time we have stayed in this hotel). Warm, clean spacious room with a huge comfortable bed. No frills but that is reflected in the price. We asked for extra tea and coffee and this was provided immediately. Hotel was quiet, despite the fact that our room was next to the lift - never heard a thing. Friendly staff. No complaints.
reviews.title: One night stay

reviews.text: Had a really nice stay at the Premier Inn Boreham when staying for a wedding nearby. Room was really clean and the bed was really comfy. Nick on reception was really helpful at both check in and sorting us out a taxi. We are lunch in The Grange (pub attached) and it was really good and value for money. Will certainly return if needing to stay nearby again.
reviews.title: A great stay.

reviews.text: Hotel was good, very clean and exactly as you would expect from this somewhat overpriced 'budget' hotel chain.
reviews.title: As expected.....

reviews.text: The restaurant next door was however at best poor. 'The Grange' was not what I would have expected. Slow service with staff that didn't seem to care at all. I suspect they are short staffed so the staff are very busy - that is however no excuse. It was the same at breakfast.
reviews.title: As good/as bad as always

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I try and avoid using Premier Inn, Travelodge etc, not because they are bad hotels, but I find them perhaps too efficient. That sometimes translates to a little heartless. However, needs must!
reviews.title: Nice clean and tidy room

reviews.text: I must admit I really rate Premier Inns for value and more importantly quality. I have just returned having had a one night stay at this particular Premier Inn.My parents also stayed at the same time but were on the ground floor.
reviews.title: Nice place, nice staff noisy customers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Let me start with staff, no complaints all very friendly and helpful. The room on the second floor was large, clean and although backing onto the A12 I believe it was not at all noisy.
reviews.title: Super Hotel service, Breakfast yuck

reviews.text: However, the guests ( I use that term loosely) who arrived back at about 4.30am and spent the next 30 minutes wandering from their friends rooms slamming doors and obviously believing it was 4.30pm in the afternoon were the only problem of my stay.I can only assume it was the ones that had the 'Do Not Disturb' notices hanging on their door handles later on in the morning.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: I know the Premier Inn do a good nights sleep guarantee or your money back but I believe that you cannot hold them responsible for the bad manners of other people.
reviews.title: very poor stay

reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent and the girls working there were friendly helpful and even busy always managed to smile.
reviews.title: Typical Premier Inn, dissapointed with the food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Travelled as a couple whilst taking exams for Degree. Stayed at this Premier Inn for ease of access and closeness to the University. The other premier inn is closer, but is more of a hassle to get to.
reviews.title: A Very Good Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed originally for 3 nights, but we bought another night so we could relax on the very comfortable (we want one!) King-size bed. The rooms were spotless, very clean, well presented and felt homely (minus a fridge!)
reviews.title: I will stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't really have much interaction with staff here, they greeted and said bye as we entered and exited the hotel, and helped when our key failed to work. We did ask for an extra pillow to be brought up as we came in from eating (at reception) and the girl said she'd bring it up for us. We waited two hours and called reception to be told 'I'll bring it up' ... We never got it. Never mind though! We slept well without it.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: We ate at the Grange 4 times - 2 breakfast, 2 evening meal. The Meals are superb! Very well cooked and good value for what you receive. The breakfasts were also good.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First time we've stayed at a hotel, and would definitely return back here again in future.
reviews.title: Its what you expect! - But poor wifi... next door

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For what the hotels advertise they are it was alot more then expected and matchs some of the higher rate prices I've paid just for the name very good and recommend 5*! Room was extremely large and the shower had power better then my own would of stayed in there all day if possible, did not eat as was late stay early leave but there was a pub/ resturant next door that could be used.
reviews.title: Good clean fun stay

reviews.text: Do not stay here. Staff are rude. Tell you things that aren't true. Have major attitude with you. Rooms
reviews.title: Terrible service!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Are freezing with a little radiator that doesn't heat the corner it's in let alone the room. Night staff are nowhere to be seen. Anyone can just walk in or out. Not safe at all. Vending machine empty.
reviews.title: Premier Inn Boreham, Chelmsford

reviews.text: An excellent overnight stop. Only visited as going to a party close by. Pub attached to restaurant very nice food looked good although didn't have anything to eat. Staff friendly. There is another premier inn at Springfield which is really close but this ones nicer!
reviews.title: Premier inn Boreham

reviews.text: Stayed for a family occasion , booked 2 rooms which were both very clean and had everything we needed the staff were very helpful . The pub food was wonderful and the girl who served us very friendly would stay there again .
reviews.title: Premier Inn Boreham
